text: Di manusia watee meularat 1 Bak Kamoe meuhat meuduʻa bagah ` Jieh ngon jiduek got sira jidong Duʻa jih mantong hana jikeubah Lheuh kamoe peuglah meularat jihnyan Tuwo jih lheuhnyan peue nyang ka leupah Sang-sang tan sagai na jimeuduʻa Bak Kamoe hana jilakee beuglah Meunan keuh awak nyang elanya droe Bandum buetjih nyoe ka geupeuindah
